example.text: Rather than working with Democrats to enact comprehensive immigration reform, Republicans are pushing a partisan package that will separate families at the border. Immigrants make our country stronger, & we need a humane immigration system that reflects that. [[url]]

This bipartisan legislation will enhance the tools available to the outstanding forecasters at the National Weather Service who dedicate their time and expertise to protecting lives, property, and so much more.

NEWS: My bill to improve weather forecasting models just passed the House with bipartisan support! Extreme weather events are costly & dangerous. That's why it's critical that we have the tools to form accurate & timely weather predictions. [[url]]

Republicans have betrayed the people of North Carolina & turned back the clock 50 years. But this fight isn’t over. Republicans will feel the ramifications of this abortion ban at the ballot box. [[url]]

I had a great time visiting the Thompson Family Farm. Farmers like the Thompsons are an essential part of our community and economy in North Carolina and beyond. I will keep supporting the success of our farms and farmers, especially as Congress works on the Farm Bill.? [[url]]

It was a pleasure meeting with the Moldovan delegation this week. As co-chair of the Congressional Moldova Caucus, I know how important the relationship is between NC and Moldova. It’s critical that we continue to support our Moldovan allies. [[url]]
